summary: Diagnosed with an autoimmune disease, journalist Shannon Harvey went in search of the missing link in healthcare. Featuring interviews with leading scientists The Connection proves we have more to say about our health than we thought.
cast: Herbert Benson|Alice Domar|Craig Duncan|Damien Finnis|Ian Gawler|Craig Hassed|George Jelinek|Sara Lazar|Dean Ornish|Ann Salerno|David Spiegel|Scott Stephens|Esther Sternberg|Jason Wachob|Craig Walker|Andrew Weil|Susan Ling Young|Jon Kabat Zinn
title: The Connection
